attributes.action: restore corporal punishment for use in Junior and Secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people of Great Britain ask the Prime Minister Gordon Brown, to seriously consider the re-introduction of corporal punishment to Junior and Secondary schools.

We feel that many children no longer have respect for adults, and feel that it is absolutely essential, without question, that boundaries be re-drawn, in order to create a civilised society.

This will be absolutely essential to maintain, and create law and order.
